_header: If thou comes to the flood
_description: Be patient: wait for better weather; an extract from The Proverbs of Hendyng (3383) — one 6-line stanza (aabccb) headed ‘Aristoteles magnus’

NLS3473.First Lines:
Gyf thou cummis to the fludeAnd the wawis be
                    woude…
NLS3473.Last Lines:
…quhan wynd & wade ar awayThanne ma þou waid at
                    will
